job.title: Software Design Engineer
job.description: Hunter Engineering Company a global leader in the development and manufacturing of computerbased automotive service equipmentbrbrWe are currently seeking a RampD Engineer Software Design for our RampD operationsbrbrFounded in 1946 Hunter has a history of product ingenuity and growth and has been a worldwide market leader for decades Our computerbased products set the quality and technological standard in the industry Hunter Engineering Company offers stateoftheart automotive service equipment such as wheel alignment systems wheel balancers tire changers lift racks and brake testersbrbrstronguJob SummarybrbrustrongWe are looking for a Software Design Engineer to design and develop machine vision based products with emphasis on software developmentbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Perform new product research and conceptual design as member of our design team lili Develop implement and test vision based software algorithms lili Support development of application level software lili Support further development of existing products as needed lili Support development of factory test fixtures as required brliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulli Bachelors of Science degree in Electrical Engineering Computer Engineering or Computer Science lili Experience with Microsoft Visual Studio is preferred lili Knowledgeable in matrix algebra 3D perspective geometry and optimization algorithms lili Experience developing application level software including screen design and user interface design lili Experience with working in a multiple developer team environment with configuration management and defect tracking tools is preferred lili Experience in developing code for embedded systems is also desired lili Experience developing software in C C using a Windowsbased development environment is required brliulstronguPreferred Experiencebrustrongulli C lili Azure lili Electron amp Angular lili NET Core React amp TypeScript lili JSON lili RESTful APIs lili Version Control Team Foundation Server andor Gitliul
